PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Integral training and "soft skills" in the "life span"
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Integral training and "soft skills" in the "life span" perspective: a continuing education in search of excellence and effectiveness criteria for the performance in the context of work.

INTEGRANTES-DO-PROJETO.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: FIZ PEREZ, F.J.;FIZ PEREZ, FRANCISCO JAVIER;PEREZ, J.;PEREZ, F. J. F.;PEREZ,JAVIER FIZ;PEREZ, JAVIER FIZ;FIZ PЙREZ, FRANCISCO JAVIER;FIZ PEREZ, Francisco;FIZ-Pйrez, Javier;FIZ-PEREZ, JAVIER

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Human Behavior and Ethics in the Workplace as a Base for Development sustainable: social, personal and organizational in the context of cross cultural intelligence for the management of internationally-oriented organizations.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Human Behavior and Ethics in the Workplace as a Base for Development sustainable: social, personal and organizational in the context of cross cultural intelligence for the management of internationally-oriented organizations. Worker life quality, human resources management, effectiveness and ethics in the making decisions, with particular attention to the theme of good climate perception and quality in systematic relationships with a look at their own initiative in the integration into the world of work. The centrality of the person, the first resource of a business organization is the real engine that ensures healthy functioning of systems and executive methodologies. Ethical Leadership towards Subsidiarity and the common good in the context of globalization with a research proposal and promoting quality of life while respecting social integration as a value added in working contexts.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Internal and external communication in business contexts
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Communication Internal: Instruments, group management, interpersonal communication techniques etc ,. And external: Marketing. Communication as an integration tool social in the context of work. Strengthening motivation through good internal communication. Prevention of cyberstress and tecnotress. Effective management and correct new communication instruments in the digital era

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Orientation and Coaching, within the Organizations
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Orientation and Coaching, within the Organizations: Identification of every person's potential. Orientation towards the "Commitment" Criteria of effectiveness of counseling in the context of work for identifying interests professional, profiles, etc. Instruments for the stimulation of true learning. The Orientation in Vulnerability and Disadvantages.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Management of deviance in the working context in the prevention of the related stress work to promote organizational well-being
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Management of deviance in the working context in the prevention of the related stress work to promote organizational well-being:. Systems of Prevention of Organizational Deviance (Bullying, Moving, etc) and Evaluation of the stess. Trauma management, conflict, dependencies, search for improving the corporate and organizational climate in the current context of crisis, depression and no motivation to improve business climate for greater work efficiency.
